ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Can Someone Help Me
ygData.msgSnippet: Your email addy may be verified but it might not be selected as your default email choice for this group. You will need to go and select your email address
ygData.messageBody:
Your email addy may be verified but it might not be selected as your default
email choice for this group. You will need to go and select your email
address instead of your yahoo as the default one for this group.
luv,
-Su

> Was wondering, when I try to email from my personal email-the email
> never shows up. My email address is verified etc, I can come on here
> and post and it shows up instantly, I can also post from my yahoo
> email and it shows up within few seconds. My wife posts from hers-
> which her email is through same place mine is and she can post from
> the email with no problems.
> Why can I not post via email? Anyone able to help me?
> David
>
>
>
